title: Bobby Awards The Newest Employee of the Month! + Should Schools Allow Digital Touch Ups for Pictures? Bobby Shares PSA after His Dog Escape
itunes:title: Bobby Awards The Newest Employee of the Month! + Should Schools Allow Digital Touch Ups for Pictures? Bobby Shares PSA after His Dog Escape
description:
Bobby lets everyone make their case to be Employee of the Month and then he picks a winner! Bobby and Amy debate on whether or not schools should allow the retouching of school pictures based on a news story. Bobby shares a PSA after one of his dogs escaped from his home. We also play a round of Who Wants to Be A Hundredaire that never fails to get crazy.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
